# SceneUnderstandingComponent.EntityType.meshChunk

**Case**

An entity that models the physical shape of the environment within a given cubic region.

## Declaration

```swift
case meshChunk
```

## Choosing the entity type

- **SceneUnderstandingComponent.EntityType.face**: An entity that models a face that the framework detects in the physical environment.
